metadata.title: CVE-2023-52880 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: tty:n_gsm: require CAP_NET_ADMIN to attach N_GSM0710 ldisc Any unprivilegeduser can attach N_GSM0710 ldisc, but it requires CAP_NET_ADMIN to create aGSM network anyway. Require initial namespace CAP_NET_ADMIN to do that.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
